title: Moderate User-Submitted Film Review
description: A user submits a film review that has been automatically flagged for containing hate speech.

tasks.description: Retrieve the flagged review from the moderation queue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accesses the user's review and the reason it was flagged.

tasks.description: Review the content against the platform's community guidelines for hate speech.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the review violates community guidelines.

tasks.description: Remove the review from the platform and issue a warning to the user's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully deletes the review and applies a warning strike to the user.
